name: Proficonf DARK
description:
Changes the appearance of the site to dark.

Added improvements:
Chat is now dark
Participant menu is now dark
--
Input field is more round
Changed appearance of the smiley menu
Changed appearance of tips

Animations:
Animation for opening the chat / participant menu has been changed
Added animation to close the chat / participant menu

Also added benefits:
Chat size can now be changed using slider
Now size of human-broadcast document / video can be changed using slider

style_setting_options.label: Resizable chat and content (Default)
Resizable chat
